metadata.name: Execute Files with Msdeploy.exe
metadata.comment: Detects file execution using the msdeploy.exe lolbin

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('verb:sync')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-source:runcommand')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-dest:runcommand')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msdeploy.exe')))

output.summary: Detects file execution using the msdeploy.exe lolbin

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: System administrator Usage References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Msdeploy/, https://twitter.com/pabraeken/status/995837734379032576, https://twitter.com/pabraeken/status/999090532839313408
